settings.subheading: BE THE STAR OF THE SHOW
settings.title: Shop Our Best-Sellers
ABOUT US
settings.text:
The Untitled Project is an eco-friendly clothing store, that prioritizes helping people take their first step into a sustainable lifestyle by ethically producing handmade pieces, and ensuring every purchase leaves no carbon footprint. We set the standard high and continuously improve our quality.

We aim to inspire women to be the best version of themselves, in their own skin - and of course, their outfits. Our goal is to use fashion to define who you are. From urban to classic, or workday to weekend, we recognize the importance of a diverse wardrobe and seek to ensure each you curate and find your own label.

settings.title: TUP
settings.richtext: "Your personality is not just about how you speak and interact with other people; you can tell a lot about a person through their attire and their unique choice of style"

settings.title: Get Exclusive offers & Updates
settings.newsletter_description: Receive our emails including the latest trends, promotions, and sales directly to your inbox!

settings.title: Classic
settings.description: You prefer timeless looks. Simple cuts, and fine natural fabrics. Casual on-the-go to abayas are your cup of tea. You appreciate practical and budget friendly clothing.

settings.title: Chic
settings.description: You wear a lot of classics and neutrals. You come across as elegant, polished, regal, put together, and understood.

settings.title: Bohemian
settings.description: The Bohemian personality¬†type enjoys a mix of patterns and layers. You prefer fabrics which are natural, choose colors which are soft and muted or which can be found in nature.¬†

settings.title: Sporty
settings.description: A sporty style is relaxed and allows for easy movement. You're¬†a casual Gal, and would rather go for an effortless, very simple, laidback but bold look.

settings.title: Dramatic
settings.description: Making a statement with eye-catching pieces. A strong independent¬†look that knows how to make an entrance. You prefer bold, glamorous or sophisticated, and statement pieces.

settings.title: Trendy
settings.description: You are a proper fashionista, you want to be the best dressed and always fashion-forward. You follow latest trends, and pick and choose; that is what makes your personal¬†style so unique.

settings.title: Find Your Personal Style
settings.text: "As fashion stylists and personal shoppers, we have worked with thousands of women from coast to coast, and here's what we've found. Everyone belongs to one or a combination of these six style types":

settings.title: The Staples ‚ú®
settings.text: Choose from 6 different colored abayas each with its own unique embroidered frame like a lemon, turtle, cactus, and many more on the back.

settings.description: The Untitled Project is an eco-friendly clothing store, prioritizing helping customers take their first step into a sustainable lifestyle by ethically producing handmaid pieces, and ensuring every purchase leaves no carbon footprint. We aim to inspire women to be the best version of themselves in their own skin - and of course, their outfits. From urban to classic, or workday to weekend, we recognize the importance in a diverse wardrobe and seek to ensure each one of you curates and finds their own label.
